attributes.action: Government must initiate a mechanism to help elderly to remain isolated.
attributes.additional_details: Government must initiate a mechanism to help elderly to be isolated in terms of groceries and other daily needs shopping.
attributes.background: Government must initiate a mechanism to help elderly to remain isolated in terms of groceries and other daily needs shopping.

rejection.details:
We have published a petition calling on the Government to provide all pensioners a survival pack containing essentials to last 30 days, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302940

We have published a petition calling on the Government to encourage retailers to prioritise those over 70 shopping online for essentials, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301126

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
